languages.text: {n}Эльдар неожиданно вздрагивает и указывает на странную игровую доску, которую вы забрали с собой.{/n} "Что это... Объяснись, мон-кай! Зачем, во имя всех богов, тебе понадобилось терзать {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Yrliet_HasFarseerItem}одну из моих сестер{/d}? О, ты слишком глуп{mf||а}, чтобы осознать, не так ли? В этом предмете заключена душа одной из провидец с Крудараха, и каждое твое прикосновение приносит неописуемую боль ее бессмертной душе".

traits.locale_text: {n}Эльдар неожиданно вздрагивает и указывает на странную игровую доску, которую вы забрали с собой.{/n} "Что это... Объяснись, мон-кай! Зачем, во имя всех богов, тебе понадобилось терзать одну из моих сестер? О, ты слишком глуп{mf||а}, чтобы осознать, не так ли? В этом предмете заключена душа одной из провидец с Крудараха, и каждое твое прикосновение приносит неописуемую боль ее бессмертной душе".
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}Suddenly the Aeldari recoils and points to the strange game board you took with you.{/n} "What is this? Explain yourself, mon-keigh! What in all the gods' names made you decide to torture {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Yrliet_HasFarseerItem}one of my sisters{/d}? Oh, are you too stupid to realise it? Is that it? The soul of a Farseer from Crudarach is imprisoned in this object, and your every touch causes unspeakable pain to her immortal soul."
languages.original_text: {n}Эльдар неожиданно вздрагивает и указывает на странную игровую доску, которую вы забрали с собой.{/n} "Что это... Объяснись, мон-кай! Зачем, во имя всех богов, тебе понадобилось терзать {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Yrliet_HasFarseerItem}одну из моих сестер{/d}? О, ты слишком глуп{mf||а}, чтобы осознать, не так ли? В этом предмете заключена душа одной из провидец с Крудараха, и каждое твое прикосновение приносит неописуемую боль ее бессмертной душе".

What in all gods' names made you decide to torture one of my sisters? Oh, are you too stupid to realise it? Is that it? The soul of a Farseer from Crudarach is imprisoned in this object, and your every touch causes unspeakable pain to her immortal soul."

What in all the gods' names made you decide to torture {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Yrliet_HasFarseerItem}one of my sisters{/d}? Oh, are you too stupid to realise it? Is that it? The soul of a Farseer from Crudarach is imprisoned in this object, and your every touch causes unspeakable pain to her immortal soul."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}De repente, el Aeldari retrocede espantado y señala el extraño tablero de juego que llevas contigo.{/n} «¿Qué es esto? ¡Explícate, mon-keigh! En el nombre de los dioses, qué te ha movido a querer {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Yrliet_HasFarseerItem}torturar a una de mis hermanas{/d}? ¿O quizá eres demasiado {mf|estúpido|estúpida} para darte cuenta? ¿Es eso? El alma de una vidente está encerrada en ese objeto, y cada vez que lo tocas causas un dolor indecible a su alma inmortal».
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly the Aeldari recoils and points to the strange game board you took with you.{/n} "What is this? Explain yourself, mon-keigh! What in all the gods' names made you decide to torture {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Yrliet_HasFarseerItem}one of my sisters{/d}? Oh, are you too stupid to realise it? Is that it? The soul of a Farseer from Crudarach is imprisoned in this object, and your every touch causes unspeakable pain to her immortal soul."

traits.locale_text: {n}De repente, el Aeldari retrocede espantado y señala el extraño tablero de juego que llevas contigo.{/n} «¿Qué es esto? ¡Explícate, mon-keigh! En el nombre de los dioses, qué te ha movido a querer torturar a una de mis hermanas? ¿O quizá eres demasiado {mf|estúpido|estúpida} para darte cuenta? ¿Es eso? El alma de una vidente está encerrada en ese objeto, y cada vez que lo tocas causas un dolor indecible a su alma inmortal».
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}突然アエルダリはたじろぎ、あなたの持っている奇妙な遊戯盤を指差した。{/n} 「これは何だ？説明しろ、モン＝ケイ！一体全体、何が目的で我が{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Yrliet_HasFarseerItem}姉妹の1人{/d}を拷問した？なるほど、お前は愚かすぎて理解もできんのか。そうなのだろう？この中に封じ込められているのはクルダラの先見司の魂であり、お前が触れるたびに、とてつもない苦痛が彼女の不滅の魂にもたらされるんだぞ」
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly the Aeldari recoils and points to the strange game board you took with you.{/n} "What is this? Explain yourself, mon-keigh! What in all the gods' names made you decide to torture {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Yrliet_HasFarseerItem}one of my sisters{/d}? Oh, are you too stupid to realise it? Is that it? The soul of a Farseer from Crudarach is imprisoned in this object, and your every touch causes unspeakable pain to her immortal soul."

traits.locale_text: {n}突然アエルダリはたじろぎ、あなたの持っている奇妙な遊戯盤を指差した。{/n} 「これは何だ？説明しろ、モン＝ケイ！一体全体、何が目的で我が{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Yrliet_HasFarseerItem}姉妹の1人{/d}を拷問した？なるほど、お前は愚かすぎて理解もできんのか。そうなのだろう？この中に封じ込められているのはクルダラの先見司の魂であり、お前が触れるたびに、とてつもない苦痛が彼女の不滅の魂にもたらされるんだぞ」
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}艾达灵族看到你随身带着的古怪棋盘之后，突然退了几步。{/n}“这是怎么回事？解释一下，猴子！看在诸神的份上，你为什么打算折磨{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Yrliet_HasFarseerItem}我的姐妹{/d}？噢，你是不是蠢到根本没意识到这件事？是这样吗？这个棋盘里囚禁着克鲁达拉赫先知的灵魂，你的每次触碰，都会给她不朽的灵魂带来难以言喻的痛苦。”
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly the Aeldari recoils and points to the strange game board you took with you.{/n} "What is this? Explain yourself, mon-keigh! What in all the gods' names made you decide to torture {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Yrliet_HasFarseerItem}one of my sisters{/d}? Oh, are you too stupid to realise it? Is that it? The soul of a Farseer from Crudarach is imprisoned in this object, and your every touch causes unspeakable pain to her immortal soul."

traits.locale_text: {n}艾达灵族看到你随身带着的古怪棋盘之后，突然退了几步。{/n}“这是怎么回事？解释一下，猴子！看在诸神的份上，你为什么打算折磨我的姐妹？噢，你是不是蠢到根本没意识到这件事？是这样吗？这个棋盘里囚禁着克鲁达拉赫先知的灵魂，你的每次触碰，都会给她不朽的灵魂带来难以言喻的痛苦。”
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}Soudain, l'Aeldari a un mouvement de recul et pointe du doigt l'étrange plateau de jeu que vous portez.{/n} « Que se passe-t-il ? Expliquez-vous, mon-keigh ! Au nom des dieux, pourquoi avez-vous décidé de torturer {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Yrliet_HasFarseerItem}l'une de mes sœurs{/d} ? Oh, êtes-vous trop stupide pour le réaliser ? C'est bien ça ? L'âme immortelle d'un Grand Prophète de Crudarach est emprisonnée dans cet objet, et chaque contact lui inflige une douleur indicible. »
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly the Aeldari recoils and points to the strange game board you took with you.{/n} "What is this? Explain yourself, mon-keigh! What in all the gods' names made you decide to torture {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Yrliet_HasFarseerItem}one of my sisters{/d}? Oh, are you too stupid to realise it? Is that it? The soul of a Farseer from Crudarach is imprisoned in this object, and your every touch causes unspeakable pain to her immortal soul."

traits.locale_text: {n}Soudain, l'Aeldari a un mouvement de recul et pointe du doigt l'étrange plateau de jeu que vous portez.{/n} « Qu'est-ce que c'est que ça ? Expliquez-vous, mon-keigh ! Au nom des dieux, pourquoi avez-vous décidé de torturer l'une de mes sœurs ? Oh, êtes-vous trop stupide pour le réaliser ? C'est bien ça ? L'âme immortelle d'un Grand Prophète de Crudarach est emprisonnée dans cet objet, et chaque contact lui inflige une douleur indicible. »
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}Plötzlich weicht der Aeldari zurück und zeigt auf das sonderbare Spielbrett, das du mitgenommen hast.{/n} "Was ist das? Erklärt Euch, Chem-Pan-Sey! Was im Namen der Götter hat Euch dazu verleitet, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Yrliet_HasFarseerItem}eine meiner Schwestern{/d} zu foltern? Oder seid Ihr einfach zu dumm, um das zu erkennen? Ist das der Grund? In diesem Objekt ist die Seele einer Runenprophetin von Crudarach gefangen und immer, wenn ihr es berührt, erleidet ihre unsterbliche Seele unsagbare Schmerzen."
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly the Aeldari recoils and points to the strange game board you took with you.{/n} "What is this? Explain yourself, mon-keigh! What in all the gods' names made you decide to torture {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Yrliet_HasFarseerItem}one of my sisters{/d}? Oh, are you too stupid to realise it? Is that it? The soul of a Farseer from Crudarach is imprisoned in this object, and your every touch causes unspeakable pain to her immortal soul."

traits.locale_text: {n}Plötzlich weicht der Aeldari zurück und zeigt auf das sonderbare Spielbrett, das du mitgenommen hast.{/n} "Was ist das? Erklärt Euch, Chem-Pan-Sey! Was im Namen der Götter hat Euch dazu verleitet, eine meiner Schwestern zu foltern? Oder seid Ihr einfach zu dumm, um das zu erkennen? Ist das der Grund? In diesem Objekt ist die Seele einer Runenprophetin von Crudarach gefangen und immer, wenn ihr es berührt, erleidet ihre unsterbliche Seele unsagbare Schmerzen."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}Aeldari, aniden geri çekilerek yanına aldığın tuhaf oyun tahtasını işaret ediyor.{/n} "Bu nereden çıktı? Yanında ne işi var? Tüm tanrılar adına... Neden {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Yrliet_HasFarseerItem}kız kardeşlerimden birine{/d} işkence yapmaya karar verdin? Yoksa farkına varamayacak kadar ahmak mısın? Hakikat bu mu? Crudarach'tan bir Ötesezen'in ruhu, bu nesneye hapsolmuş. Sen de her dokunuşunla ölümsüz ruhuna tarifsiz acılar çektiriyorsun."
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly the Aeldari recoils and points to the strange game board you took with you.{/n} "What is this? Explain yourself, mon-keigh! What in all the gods' names made you decide to torture {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Yrliet_HasFarseerItem}one of my sisters{/d}? Oh, are you too stupid to realise it? Is that it? The soul of a Farseer from Crudarach is imprisoned in this object, and your every touch causes unspeakable pain to her immortal soul."

traits.locale_text: {n}Aeldari, aniden geri çekilerek yanına aldığın tuhaf oyun tahtasını işaret ediyor.{/n} "Neler oluyor? Bunun senin yanında ne işi var? Tüm tanrılar adına, ne oldu da {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_Yrliet_HasFarseerItem}kız kardeşlerimden biri{/d}ne işkence yapmaya karar verdin? Farkına varamayacak kadar ahmak mısın yoksa? Hakikat bu mu? Crudarach'tan bir Ötesezen'in ruhu, bu nesnede hapsedilmiş. Sen de her dokunuşunla ölümsüz ruhuna tarifsiz acılar yaşatıyorsun."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer
